snippet: Spyker, a Dutch automaker, said in a lawsuit that General Motors scuttled potential deals with investors that would have saved Saab from bankruptcy.
abstract: Dutch automaker Spyker says in a $3 billion lawsuit that General Motors scuttled potential deals with investors that would have saved Saab from bankruptcy.
lead_paragraph: Spyker, a Dutch automaker, said in a lawsuit that General Motors scuttled potential deals with investors that would have saved Saab from bankruptcy.

headline.seo: Suit by Spyker Says G.M. Blocked Plan to Rescue Saab
headline.main: Lawsuit Accuses G.M. of Blocking Plan to Rescue Saab
headline.print_headline: Lawsuit Accuses G.M. of Blocking Plan to Rescue Saab
